intro: Schizoglossum bolusii, commonly known as the Bolus's beardtongue, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to southern Africa. The plant typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. Schizoglossum bolusii is often found in open grasslands and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments.
